Note:
Location (16-bit)
0xffff=Opening/Game Menu
0x6e4a=Main Menu
0x6ebd=Game Select
0x9060 -> 0x90c0=Winner/Loser Scene
0xa00b=Making Mode (Winner)
0x7180=Mode Select
0x722c=Member Select
0x7555=Order Select
0x7466=The Next Competitor / Here comes challenger

0x00=Kyo
0x01=Terry

0x14=Ex Mai
0x15=Ex Yuri

Battle Config - BitFlag (8-bit)
Bit0=Auto Pow Off: ON
Bit1=Button (A) kick (B) punch
Bit2+Bit3+Bit4= Disp Cut: On
Bit5=Advantage: Off
Bit6=Provoke: Off
